channel.title: How do i get people to connect to my server?
channel.description: i got no ip, and the little smily dude is like blushing, i opened my ports, i run the server and client, i can log on to the client, but my brother can. i changed to ip on the client to my servers. what did i do wrong?

item.title: How do i get people to connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @e_l_i_t_e e l i t e
item.description:
@e_l_i_t_e wrote:

if my tcp and udp or what ever, if they are both open that means i port fowarded right -.-

Read full topic

How to port forward and use a tutorial

item.title: How do i get people to connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

e l i t e:

um, i can connect through like, 127.1.0.0 or what ever, but that not my server ip, myy server ip is a .no-ip.org, and i can’t get my brother to connect, when i change my ip on my client to the no-ip, it dosn’t work.

So you can only connect to localhost witch is 127.0.0.1
Youre sure you have port forwarded correctly?

Read full topic
